title: playing keen combo cd in dosbox
content:
Im no good at this kind of thing so I apolagize before hand.
I recently purchased the keen combo cd off the 3drealms site and was happy that I could finally play numbers 2,3,and 5 but when I put the disk in, let it install then go to copy and paste the programs it tells me "keen" is an illegal command and none of the episodes work, not even number 4 which worked before on my computer. Whats wrong?
-yodablob, the proud new owner of the commander keen combo cd!

title: Re: playing keen combo cd in dosbox
content:
The different Keen games have differently named executables.
For Keen 4 try entering "keen4e", for K5 try "keen5e", and K6 should be "keen6" without the "e".
This is from memory, so experiment if it doesn't work.

Also type in "dir *.exe" to see which executables you could use.Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: playing keen combo cd in dosbox
content: thankyou, number 4 and 5 are now working, but 1,2, and 3 still are not working, and Im totaly lost on what to do.

title: Re:
content: Can't you just drag the executable icon on the Dosbox icon?

title: Re: playing keen combo cd in dosbox
content:
Can you tell us a litte about where you've installed the games, and what folders you mount within DOSBox?________________
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v462/lemur821/YorpEye.png[/img]

title: Re: playing keen combo cd in dosbox
content: I just figured it out, I couldn't drag and drop the shortcut file that was in the start menu folder, I had to find where the actual file was and copy and paste that one into dosbox, thanks for the help guys!
